Reviews.Title: Excellent Bypass Unit
Reviews.Author: Kebre-Ab Beckford
Reviews.Content: I recently bought the Python 991 Responder LC3 SST Security/Remote Start System and didn't know I needed an immobilizer bypass unit till the installer informed me. I wanted to have the installation done quickly so went on Amazon the same day and located the PKALL Encrypted Key Data Transponder Bypass Kit. It had excellent reviews so I ordered it with one day shipping. Got the unit the next day and had the alarm system installed. The bypass kit connects directly to the brain of the Python alarm system as well as the brain of all the major brands, so no special connections were needed. Since the installation, my vehicle starts, on queue, every time I press the remote start button on my alarm system's remote. Once started, I am able to drive off without shutting off the car and restarting with the key, just by putting the key into the ignition and turning it to the start position. It works so well that the company that installed my alarm, uses the PKALL bypass kit for most installations and recommends it to their customers. This is an excellent product and I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Annoying programming
Reviews.Author: Balien
Reviews.Content: Make sure you get the printout for your specific vehicle directly from their website it will show you your vehicle only. the instructions it comes with are less detailed although they do cover all vehicles. The pkall is supposed to flash 10 times when programmed and mine either didn't or did it so fast I didn't see it while i was putting the key in the ignition. I ended up wasting 3 hours ringing out wires, checking connections and reprogramming because it wouldn't flash. After all that I found out it was working. The programming sucks you have to hold a button while hooking up all the connectors hidden up in the dash. Given all that it works perfectly with no wasted key. Great product.

Reviews.Title: What a Deal!!
Reviews.Author: Range Snodgrass
Reviews.Content: Product is required to install remote start. Best Buy did not tell us this when we purchased the kits. They wanted 79.99 for the same product. This was half and they used it when installing.

Reviews.Title: Install directions could be better....only reviewing for someone else in need of help
Reviews.Author: Justin Moore
Reviews.Content: The directions that came with the unit were basic so I located the vehicle specific instructions on the xpresskit website. These vehicle specific instructions showed the pinouts, but, not the wire colors connected to the connector. After installing in my Ford Ranger with an experienced installer that used to own a Ziebart where they installed tons of remote starts we could not figure out why the bypass would not program. The next day after installing I ran some tests with with my DMM and determined that the diagram showed the connector upside down of how it was actually mounted in the vehicle. I rewired the connection opposite of our first try and it programmed. Works great after a correct install/program, but, as others have posted, there is no customer service for DIY installers. The phone number was useless and the websites are for dealers only. The only thing I did find indirectly online for anyone seeking help is a directed(mfg of xpresskit) knowledge base (google it/your problem) it showed some known problems/solutions in a q&a; type setup where administrators would give a possible solution. Overall, still very glad I purchased this product as it saved me from having to keep a transponder key in my vehicle.

Reviews.Title: Works for me
Reviews.Author: mccleader26
Reviews.Content: Have a 2007 F150 FX2 Screw. Had installed with the viper 5901 and everything works fine. Need two factory keys to program, but afterward you keep both keys.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly on my 2005 Honda Civic
Reviews.Author: Dan of Colorado
Reviews.Content: Does what it's supposed to. What more can you ask?Oh yah... Installs are a pain even with a friend who used to do it for a living. You save a ton of money though.

Reviews.Title: Best solution
Reviews.Author: Cinderella
Reviews.Content: Installed professionally on a 2007 Toyota Sienna with a Viper 5302.The installer wanted to charge me 85 bucks for it but instead paid only 36 here on Amazon.No spare key needed either.

Reviews.Title: Does work well
Reviews.Author: gmark
Reviews.Content: Installed this module in a Ford Ranger. Was easy to install but very nerve-racking to program. Make sure you are familiar with ALL the instructions before programming. The blinking light at the end of programming blinks WAAAY too fast. Ten blinks in about a second.

Reviews.Title: remote
Reviews.Author: dasdaddyo
Reviews.Content: The transporter was easy to install just follow the manual step by step programming ended by just as ease I would use this product and recommend it

Reviews.Title: Didn't work
Reviews.Author: Paul L. Davis "historyguy197"
Reviews.Content: Right out of the box it did not work at all. I had another model installed through a dealer that worked fine.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: Great price. Works great too. I installed in my 2005 Sienna by my self.The problems are I did not get any help from manufacture because I am not a certified installer and I observed after the installation when I used the key to start, the by pass module take extra 2 seconds to learn that the key is there. Everything else is excelent.

Reviews.Title: first diy for remote starter
Reviews.Author: smy
Reviews.Content: It was good. most thing was good.the terminology is a little bit confusing, It was different with remote starter installation explanations.

Reviews.Title: No idea
Reviews.Author: Grenade Motorsports
Reviews.Content: I don't know what I was thinking. I bought this and it is not used for what I thought it was. I think this has something to do with a remote start. Didn't do what I wanted it to but it's not their fault.

Reviews.Title: ehh
Reviews.Author: Skyler Keim
Reviews.Content: I cant really say how great this is cause after tedious researching I found out it wasn't need for the application I was getting it installed. But I will say awesome customer service for returning the item

Reviews.Title: Would not program
Reviews.Author: Zachary Strauss
Reviews.Content: Following the instructions exactly, I was not able to get the program to take in this unit.  2003 4runner Limited.

Reviews.Title: good system came on time
Reviews.Author: Jose L. Roman
Reviews.Content: the rate is per the instructions will confuse you and need you to go to the page of xpresskit and see updates for installation in your car, after all this works great.

Reviews.Title: do not work with mr2 spyder
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Kim "Jonathan Kim"
Reviews.Content: this item do not work with toyota mr2 spyder, instructions is wrong and customer service do not really helps, they are keep saying that there instruction is good. Instruction told me to tap the wire that not even there or totally  wrong wire.

Reviews.Title: A perfect Fit
Reviews.Author: Robin Chew
Reviews.Content: Worked perfectly for my Honda CRV. I'm glad I purchased this. It was defiantly needed for the installation of my auto car start.

Reviews.Title: Mislead
Reviews.Author: mourad
Reviews.Content: I ordered this after I read all the reviews.It says works with Honda civic 2013 which is true except that it will only start the car but it will not give you the function of opening the doors or close them.So I end up buying another bypass.It will not even work for Camry 2008Before you order it check if it is compatible with your car or not.

Reviews.Title: Does its job for how cheap it is.
Reviews.Author: MATTHEW BOULDIN
Reviews.Content: cheaper than best buy. this is what you need if your car key has a chip. depending on make and model.

Reviews.Title: Ford Taurus 2006
Reviews.Author: Moussa El-hallak
Reviews.Content: I used it with remote starter and work good. you really have to use two original keys (within very short period - as quick as you can) in order for this to work. but it will if you follow the steps

Reviews.Title: Super easy and intuitive install.
Reviews.Author: Eric Arroyo
Reviews.Content: Installed in a couple minutes once I found the wires that I needed to connect to. Then I just followed the instructions for how to turn the car on, saw the led on the unit blink a few times then stop and I was good to go. I've had this installed for about a month now with no issues so far.

Reviews.Title: Not compatible with my truck
Reviews.Author: Dean R Arnold
Reviews.Content: I was looking for the instructions for my specific vehicle, 2006 Nissan Frontier, and it just so happens it skips over mine. It supports the earlier model and later model, but not mine.

Reviews.Title: Works great with Avital remote starter on a 2008 Mercury Mariner. Self installed.
Reviews.Author: K. Ingram "spiffykyle"
Reviews.Content: After getting quotes in the $300 and up range to have a remote start installed, I looked into doing it myself. I am a fairly handy guy and have done some car wiring before. The biggest thing is to do some research ahead of time and plan all the connections out.I installed this on a 2008 Mercury Mariner Premier. The installation guide can be found online with a simple google search. I used alldata.com to get my car's wiring diagrams and connector locations. I used the Avital 4103LX remote starter.Prep work took a couple of hours ahead of time to tie off wires I wouldn't need and make connections between the remote starter and the bypass. Actual installation took a good 6 hours in total. Programming took 5 minutes at most.If you are handy, can solder, have access to and can read wiring diagrams, this is definitely a doable project.The bypass works great and I got it programmed on the first try. You need two working keys to program this unit, but you don't have to leave one in the unit.Can't beat the price!

Reviews.Title: Quick and easy
Reviews.Author: Joshua
Reviews.Content: Purchase, shipping were quick and painless. Did not realize this was a refurbished unit, if so, I would not have paid as much for it.

Reviews.Title: Does its job
Reviews.Author: Mike Kovatch
Reviews.Content: I had gotten a do it yourself bulldog car starter for xmas....a friend suggested I get this to use with the starter.  Product works great and I haven't had any issues so far

Reviews.Title: Did the trick
Reviews.Author: Darth Maul
Reviews.Content: I have a 2005 Ford Expedition and a Viper 7901 alarm system...had some issues with another PK from Xpress kit and had to return and purchase this one.  It worked like a charm.  My remote start is now fully operational.

Reviews.Title: Unable to get it to work, No help from manufacture
Reviews.Author: Douglas Hayter
Reviews.Content: Followed instruction from manufactures website. Would not work. No support unless you are a paying installer. I don't understand this manufacture, If they want to sell this product they should support it to the public. If you plan to install it yourself, make sure you buy it through directed web site or there is no warranty. ( this is stated on directed website ).

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Installed with my Avital remote starter in my 2008 civic. Worked right away after being programmed. Programming was very simple as was wiring. The unit is much smaller than I imagined which is great as hiding these things away under the dash can be tricky.

Reviews.Title: Great unit.
Reviews.Author: Samuel Moua
Reviews.Content: Not much to say except it worked the way it's suppose to flawlessly.  Get it if you need it, I've dealt with many alarms and alarm accessories and whenever it involves Directed Electronics, I never have a problem.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!!!
Reviews.Author: Hwyman
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this purchased.  Worked as advertised and the price was a lot cheaper then what the big box stores and audio/video stores were wanting to sell me one for.This unit plugged right into my Viper remote starter.

Reviews.Title: Soldering is the key!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Worked flawlessly!! I love these things! It is important note that these may not be for the novice installer and you need to make sure that it is updated with the most current firmware out there, which mine was. Easy to instal and programming couldn't have gone better. Also, you must solder any data wires that you are using, if you don't it may read it wrong and program incorrectly! Do a professional job, get professional results.

Reviews.Title: works but manual was confusing
Reviews.Author: D. Derek
Reviews.Content: This thing works great once you get it to work.  However Setup was very confusing. There were 2 different wiring diagram for my car 04 s2k. The hard copy manual is different from the pdf on their website.  You will need the hard copy wiring diagram and then download the programming instructions online. The programming instruction from the Hard copy manual is wrong.  Also I knocked another start because once programed it can not be programmed for another vehicle.  So if you decide to remove it, you will need to buy another one of you want to have it in another vehicle.  You can't sell this one either unless you sell your car with it.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: 4everduster
Reviews.Content: Directed Electronics rules the Immobilizer bypass industry. I've used other companies as a last resort but Directed is far better.

Reviews.Title: Works fantastic
Reviews.Author: Oliver
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised and my truck starts up every time with no glitches.  Wiring instructions included were great and it made sense when looking at the vehicle wiring diagram and descriptions.

Reviews.Title: Fixed!
Reviews.Author: Michael Grulke
Reviews.Content: This did the trick for fixing my alarm. I fried the old unit by mistake when I was working on the car.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: Bypass worked flawlessly. So much easier to use then one that needs to be preprogrammed for your vehicle. Installation was straight forward and the self programming feature was easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Performs the way it should
Reviews.Author: G. Stone "NASCAR FAN"
Reviews.Content: This device is working as expected and was compatible with my alarm. Very pleased with the decision o purchase this unit.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Todd M. Ayers
Reviews.Content: nice product super easy to install. All of the product was in excellent shape. Very nice look on the truck as well

Reviews.Title: Mounted and Installed in Minutes
Reviews.Author: Jason Zenanko
Reviews.Content: Brought it to Best Buy, they had it installed in 30 minutes!  Cheaper than buying whole new system!  I would recommend!

Reviews.Title: Does not work for a 2005 Honda Civic Hybrid
Reviews.Author: Qaphsiel
Reviews.Content: Be very careful what model you choose this for.  It said it was compatible with my car through Amazon, but the mechanic found out it was for MOST 2005 models, but not ALL of them.  Had to return it and wait for a FLCAN to arrive in the mail.  My recommendation is to simply plan ahead and buy the FLCAN.  A bit more money but a lot less hassle.

Reviews.Title: Great product, must have if installing a remote start unit
Reviews.Author: bill
Reviews.Content: I've been installing alarm/remote starter's for years and this transponder make's installation so much easier than older method's and doesn't require a spare key on most vehicle's. Programming could be a little easier like having to hold button in after wiring is connected, but still doesn't affect quality of unit. Highly recommended for any remote start unit being installed on newer vehicle's.

Reviews.Title: Works perfect for my truck.
Reviews.Author: jakiepoo
Reviews.Content: I used this in pair with the Avital 4113LX remote start on a 1999 Ford f150. Unit works exactly as advertized and communicates with the autostart well.

Reviews.Title: Works with 2006 Ford Focus
Reviews.Author: YS
Reviews.Content: Works with 2006 Ford Focus to bypass the imobilizer for remote start.  The setup timing is very short, so it may require several tries.Tip:Print out the vehicle specific manual from their web site.  It's much better than the generic manual included with the module.

Reviews.Title: fitment
Reviews.Author: Martin Avery
Reviews.Content: I think that there should be more information available of what vehicles this product works for.  If it is there I didnt see it so maybe easy to find.

Reviews.Title: Worked Perfectly!
Reviews.Author: B. Hodgkin
Reviews.Content: I have a 2006 Mercury Grand Marquis. The directions were clear, the programming was simple and it worked perfectly. One note: If it says that you need 2 keys for your car, don't forget to bring the 2nd key when you install it. It won't program without both.

Reviews.Title: good but not perfect
Reviews.Author: Mike1ch
Reviews.Content: generally more reliable than the new FL Cans but has its problems too. sometime programming fails when updating or changing the firmware. otherwise once installed seems bulletproof

Reviews.Title: PKALL
Reviews.Author: billfromkcmo
Reviews.Content: Great Product. best part for me was it did not require an extra key great plus. installed with a autopage 730. took no more then 10 minutes to add then about 2 minutes to program supper easy, easiest part of the whole thing. if it works on your car it is your best bet.

Reviews.Title: Its works like a charm
Reviews.Author: Joseph Bojohn "joe"
Reviews.Content: The sound tech was asking for $100 i got it her for way less and save 70 bucks. Item arrived on schedule and well parkage

Reviews.Title: It does what it says it does!
Reviews.Author: Marcos.D
Reviews.Content: This was the simplest part of setting up my car starter. It is practically a plug and play set up right out of the box (if your starter has a D2D port). The manual that comes with it is all over the place however, find the box that correlates to your car and mark it so you don't keep losing your spot. Simple learning, just a push of a button. Directed Electronics are worth the money.

Reviews.Title: pk all
Reviews.Author: Steve Dilling
Reviews.Content: This unit had clear instruction on the website for my Tacoma.After installing and doing set up it worked perfect with my Bulldog starter.I did have to exstend the wires from the computer , but it was easy.

Reviews.Title: Faulty?
Reviews.Author: C. D. K.
Reviews.Content: I tried to get this thing to work but could not. The LED light would never come on. I followed the directions exactly as stated for my specific vehicle from the xpresskit web site but no go. It just did not work so I sent it back to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: yes sir
Reviews.Author: very good
Reviews.Content: works great perfect service , fast shipping , and just the way a was describe highly recommended , works super ,

Reviews.Title: Good Luck
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: I find it hard to believe that people could have had success with this product if they followed the installation and particularly the programming instructions.  I am certain that it has worked for someone, but I would highly doubt that they were following the instructions to program it.  And GOOD LUCK if you need to reach customer service and or tech support  !  Unless you enjoy listening to canadian pop radio for  30 mins or more on hold, then I would SERIOUSLY recommend using an Audiovox branded item.....I have always had great success with their brands, Code Alarm, Flash Logic for immobilizer bypass kits.  Easy and most importantly ACCURATE instructions, and outstanding customer support !

Reviews.Title: pkall bypass
Reviews.Author: Armando F Pedroso
Reviews.Content: Tried to install, did not work, have installed other modules before and have never had problems I'm thinking this was programed to a different vehicle, returned to the vendor and like the manual says once programed to a vehicle it cannot be programmed again.

Reviews.Title: Not correct
Reviews.Author: Danielle Ward
Reviews.Content: Ordered the correct unit as stated on this page turned out it was NOT correct and caused problems with the computer in my car!

Reviews.Title: Pkall autostart bypass module
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: Worked great. Requires two ignition keys during programming. No instruction included . One page directions from manufacture available online, however wire color coding wrong for hot and ground wires.

Reviews.Title: Wont fit
Reviews.Author: Thomas S. Lilly "The Decaf Man"
Reviews.Content: Need to be more discripted in the years the product works in.  I have a 2002 GMC and it does not work for that vehicle

Reviews.Title: I know nothing about electronics!
Reviews.Author: Jessica Nagel
Reviews.Content: **I did not install this myself so my review is based on cost, research, feedback, and use**I was nervous about buying something online but I read the reviews on Amazon, did some cost analysis amongst other websites, and thought, "what the heck, why not?" With Amazon's amazing customer service, and for the price that this was selling for, I knew that I wasn't taking on much of a risk.I'm glad I did my research and I ordered this bypass kit with the Avital (Avital 4103LXL Remote Start System with Two 4-Button Remote) remote start system.  I am not knowledgable with after market car extras (I keep everything stock in my cars; I'm boring...I know) but the installer told me the set that I bought was a good set.  I've had no issues with this bypass kit.  It does what it's supposed to do and at a great price!

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: crackerben
Reviews.Content: This item was installed along with a remote start unit. Altogether a fair sized project, but everything works as it should.

Reviews.Title: No extra key
Reviews.Author: Erp
Reviews.Content: Like it no need for extra key easy to install could have a more illustrated install guide very good product

Reviews.Title: Works great, professionally installed
Reviews.Author: Surchand R. Kalicharan
Reviews.Content: I had originally purchased this along with an Avital 4113LX Remote Start system to work with a 2004 4Runner. I was able to keep both my keys and valet, so yeah, I've got all three keys still. The installer had a little trouble installing it, he claims using the spare keys are easier and he hadnt installed a PKALL unit for months. But the PKALL unit along with the Avital 4113 worked great and took about an hour to install. Worked great but my factory alarm kept going off when the car started but thats a different story. Bottom line is the DE PKALL unit worked perfectly with my 2004 4runner WITHOUT having to flash new firware.

Reviews.Title: Worked Fine, Just Note Delay Before Code is Sent
Reviews.Author: Jason Crawford
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to use with my 2009 Toyota along with an iDatalink module, which is the competing module for this.  They both worked fine.  I ended up sticking with the iDatalink.  One thing to note with these modules is that after the stupidly named "while running" wire has been sent ground grounded, there is a long delay before the code is actually sent to your vehicles transpoonder system, so you may have to increase the crank time for your remote start.

Reviews.Title: didnt work
Reviews.Author: chevyman8409
Reviews.Content: i received the item in good time but when i installed it it started flashing right away like it was previously programed to another vehicle and it will not work so i am not very happy with that

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: ncnettech
Reviews.Content: This is the 3rd XpressKit i have used since getting out of the Remote Start installation business 6 or 7 years ago.  All i can say these are much better than the old days.  Installed and programmed the first time in 06 Mazda 3 no issues.Also purchased on Thursday Dec 22nd under amazon prime with an EDD of Dec 28th.  Product showed up on Christmas Eve, and i was able to get the Remote Start done a week early.  Two thumbs up for Amazon Prime.

Reviews.Title: Do it yourself review.
Reviews.Author: Sitkafamily04
Reviews.Content: So I just wanted to leave a review letting anyone thinking about doing an install themselves or having it installed professionally this is a great product and directed provided FANTASTIC technical support. I paired this with a avital 4103 off amazon and they work great together.

Reviews.Title: Awsome product
Reviews.Author: J. Gilliam "mr.k-otic"
Reviews.Content: I get to keep both of my keys at home in case i lose one and works without a problem, 2003 acura cls

Reviews.Title: Exactly What I Needed!
Reviews.Author: Angela Robertson
Reviews.Content: This was exactly what i needed & i'm so happy I finally found the product at a great price. Thank You!

Reviews.Title: Seems to work peachy.
Reviews.Author: Nick Burton
Reviews.Content: Although I wasn't able to install this in my own vehicle, it was brand new and deserves at least 4 stars. This review is probably not going to help very many of you.

Reviews.Title: pk all
Reviews.Author: Neil
Reviews.Content: A must have for any after market car security system install. Reasonably priced and adapts to just about everything. Average shipping time. I'd recommend.

Reviews.Title: Works great! Easy to program!
Reviews.Author: Vince
Reviews.Content: I used this along with a Viper 5704 along with a prox and piezo into my 04 Mountaineer...and it was really easy to install like 3 wires and a plug that goes to the alarm system. At first it wasn't programming because I had not programmed the Viper to automatic mode prior to trying to program the module. But after I figured that out it programmed in like 2 minutes it was really easy. Just make sure you program the tach and the automatic transmission mode on the alarm prior to programming the PKALL...I would recommend this to anyone! VIPER 5704V FULL FEATURE CAR ALARM WITH REMOTE START AND 2-WAY PAGERDirected Install essentials Dual Zone Motion Sensor 508dInstall Essentials 513T Mini Piezo Siren

Reviews.Title: Great product, have it professionally installed!
Reviews.Author: bb007p
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product with an Avital remote start for a 2010 Fusion.  I was going to install things myself until I did some research.  First, DEI (the company that makes Avital) won't warranty the unit unless installed by an authorized installer.  Second the install directions for the remote start are poor at best.  I guess that's their way to get you to get it professionally installed.  The remote start had far too many wires and diagrams to install it myself.  I took it to Best Buy and for $225 (out the door) they installed the PKALL and remote start.  Everything worked well, and the units have a lifetime warranty on the parts by DEI, and the install is warranted for life by Best Buy.

Reviews.Title: Speed, Accurate
Reviews.Author: Aireka
Reviews.Content: It came in good timing, unfortunatley they could not get it to work on my 98 Ford Expedition. The shop was able to keep it and switch it out, since it was something they could use

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: the deal
Reviews.Content: after following the directions to the letter this unit ended up costing me $300 at the dealership to have my entire PATS system in my explorer redone because it fried my passive key.

Reviews.Title: "Kit" far far from it... Instructions are clear, but wrong.
Reviews.Author: Chad L Alder
Reviews.Content: 3 months after I "installed" this device and it still doesn't function.What i'd like to see is an actual KIT...

Reviews.Title: Was wrong part for my car
Reviews.Author: tammie riddick
Reviews.Content: I thought this was a universal item, but I guess not. It is for a Chevy. Had to spend $130 for right part.

Reviews.Title: Issues
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: Good product, but poor customer support. Website is only for registered dealers so you cannot download needed schematics. The instructions are also written as if you are a professional installer. This, along with not being able to ask questions, means you are totally on your own installing this product.

Reviews.Title: GOOD PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Alejandro
Reviews.Content: Directed Electronics PKALL Encrypted Key Data Tranponder Bypass KitI really like having the remote start in my car, but you need to know somethings before you do it. my budget was not even close to what the installation store want for the whole thing, but you do need to know they are not crazy, you need: the actual remote start( little control attach to your car key)- a module like this one in order to make work the remote start system.- a new car key, installation place do it.this module is state of the art , price is really, really good, I still can believe it, good stuff.DO NO TRY TO DO IT YOURSELF, THIS IS NOT A DIY PROJECT, PAY FOR INSTALLATION. total for this to actually work was $150.00 not even half of what the shops charge, thank to amazon top of the line products, like this one.

Reviews.Title: cheap product
Reviews.Author: 1Love
Reviews.Content: I was not able to use this item with the security alarm for my car because it was diffected. It was too late for me to return it back to the seller.

Reviews.Title: DIY people dont buy this
Reviews.Author: Thao Le
Reviews.Content: Stay away from this if you plan DIY. There is no tech support. I wasted 2 days and could not program it. Their tech support wont help. Save your time do not buy this.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Bussiness Practices
Reviews.Author: valerie "valerie"
Reviews.Content: Do NOT do bussiness with this company they are liars and cheaters i bought a product for my car and it did not work, now they are telling me it works fine and i have to pay a restocking fee. They are very rude and not very professional at all. Spend a couple dollars more and go else where if not. you are throwing your money away Valerie

Reviews.Title: RECIVED WRONG ITEM
Reviews.Author: RECIVED WRONG ITEM
Reviews.Content: I RECIVED A CELL PHONE CASE INSTEAD OF THIS ITEM. SO NO COMMENT ON THIS ACTUALL PRODUCT REVIEW. AND SAD TO SAY I DONT GET TO EXPERIENCE THIS ITEM BECAUSE I DONT HAVE IT YET.

ProductInfo.Features:
The PKALL is a data transponder bypass module that is compatible with more than 700 vehicle models from 1998 through 2009.
Includes 2 way ED2D communication port for enhanced security of factory immobilizer systems. For  Toyota, Lexus, Nissan, infiniti, Ford, Lincoln, Mercury, Mazda, Honda, Acura, Hyundai, Kia, Chevrolet, Pontiac and Suzuki.
Install Part
Data Interface
Directed Electronics
ProductInfo.Name: Directed Electronics Inc PKALL Xpress Kit Data Transponder
